rules.content: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Ally creature token for each experience counter you have.
When this creature enters, create a number of 1/1 black Harpy creature tokens with flying equal to your devotion to black.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
Whenever you attack with this creature and/or your commander, for each opponent, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token that's tapped and attacking that player.
You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, create three 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink."
Heroic â€” Whenever you cast a spell that targets this creature, create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token with haste.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. You create a number of 1/1 blue Faerie Dragon creature tokens with flying equal to the result.
For each creature card you own in exile with a memory counter on it, create a tapped and attacking token that's a copy of it. Exile those tokens at end of combat.
When this creature enters, sacrifice any number of creatures each with base power or toughness 1 or less. Create that many 4/4 colorless Eldrazi Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance.
Create X 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature tokens that are tapped and attacking, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature.
Create a 1/1 red Mercenary creature token with "{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.". Then, if you control three or more creatures, draw a card.
Create X 1/2 green Spider creature tokens with reach, where X is the number of creatures attacking you.
Target player draws a card, then exiles a card from their hand. If a creature card is exiled this way, that player creates a token that's a copy of that card.

Whenever you commit a crime, create a 1/1 red Mercenary creature token with "{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery." This ability triggers only once each turn.
